wireless.translation[0].definitions[0].d: relating to a system of communications that does not use electrical or telephone wires
wireless.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a system of sending messages by radio
wireless.translation[2].definitions[0].d: wireless phones, systems etc use signals that pass through the air rather than using wires and CABLEs
wireless.translation[2].definitions[0].e: Our expertise will allow us to provide customers with innovative solutions for linking mobile computing devices to corporate wired and wireless networks.
